attributes.action: Close down schools amid the new lockdown
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to do this because a child’s life is more important than a child’s education. The government says you cannot mingle with people outside your home, however in schools where everyone sits next to each other it’s ok. Really? That is not the way things should go during these harsh times. Life is more important than education.
attributes.background: The Government should learn from the past lockdown, keeping schools open will just cause things to get worse. I would like the Government to close down schools so that there can be a future.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
